summary: Adobe (ADBE) stock is in focus after the company reported strong sales driven by artificial intelligence (AI) adoption. headline: ADBE Q3 Deep Dive: AI Integration and New Product Momentum Drive Adobe’s Results
summary: Creative software giant Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 10.7% year on year to $5.99 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $6.1 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.31 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: ADBE Q3 Deep Dive: AI Integration and New Product Momentum Drive Adobe’s Results
content.summary: Creative software giant Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 10.7% year on year to $5.99 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $6.1 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.31 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Warner-Paramount, Adobe, SK Hynix: Trending Stocks
summary: Superman, Harry Potter and Indiana Jones under one roof? Paramount Skydance (PSKY) is preparing a cash bid for Warner Bros Discovery (WBD), according to The Wall Street Journal. Adobe (ADBE) shares rose after better-than-expected results and Nvidia (NVDA) supplier SK Hynix (000660.KS) rose after announcing the development of its new high-bandwidth memory chip. For more live coverage of markets watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and head to Yahoo Finance.

headline: Consumer sentiment, Mexico tariffs, Adobe earnings: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) cool down after markets led a record run this week, the Dow Jones Industrial Average (^DJI) closing yesterday's session above 46,000. Preliminary consumer sentiment for the month of September is due out later this morning from the University of Michigan. China warns Mexican officials as the latter plans to raise its trade tariffs on Chinese-made vehicles. Adobe (ADBE) topped its fiscal third quarter earnings and revenue estimates, released on Thursday, as the creative software company raised its outlook. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

China warns Mexican officials as the latter plans to raise its trade tariffs on Chinese-made vehicles.

Adobe (ADBE) topped its fiscal third quarter earnings and revenue estimates, released on Thursday, as the creative software company raised its outlook.
